languages.text: "Формально, пока я в свите, все изъятое Вольным Торговцем продолжает находиться под защитой арбитров... Во имя Трона, ну не спускать же мне на вас Глейто".
languages.translation_comment:
The Rogue Trader picks up a piece of loot on Leethus.
Pasqal: "I am registering a violation of the standards of interaction with objects categorised as 'Imperial Tithe, collected.'"

languages.text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"
languages.translation_comment:
The Rogue Trader picks up a piece of loot on Leethus.
Pasqal: "I am registering a violation of the standards of interaction with objects categorised as 'Imperial Tithe, collected.'"
languages.original_text: "Формально, пока я в свите, все изъятое Вольным Торговцем продолжает находиться под защитой арбитров... Во имя Трона, ну не спускать же мне на вас Глейто".

traits.locale_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you?"

"Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you?"

"Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you?"

"Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you?"

"Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

"Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

languages.text: 「厳密に言えば、俺がローグトレーダーの従者でいる限り、{mf|彼|彼女}が保管惑星から得たものはすべて高等裁定局の管理下にある…玉座よ、俺にどうしろと？グライトをお前たち全員に向けて放てと？」
languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

traits.locale_text: 「厳密に言えば、俺がローグトレーダーの従者でいる限り、{mf|彼|彼女}が保管惑星から得たものはすべて高等裁定局の管理下にある…玉座よ、俺にどうしろと？グライトをお前たち全員に向けて放てと？」

languages.text: "Solange ich zum Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehöre, ist streng genommen alles, was {mf|er|sie} aus dem Lager nimmt, nach wie vor im Besitz der Arbites ... Beim Thron, was soll ich tun, Glaito auf Euch alle hetzen?"
languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

traits.locale_text: "Solange ich zum Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehöre, ist streng genommen alles, was {mf|er|sie} aus dem Lager nimmt, nach wie vor im Besitz der Arbites ... Beim Thron, was soll ich tun, Glaito auf Euch alle hetzen?"

languages.text: «Técnicamente, mientras yo siga formando parte del séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, cualquier cosa que se lleve del mundo almacén sigue bajo custodia del Arbites... Por el Trono, ¿es que quieren que les eche encima a Glaito?».
languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

traits.locale_text: «Técnicamente, mientras yo siga formando parte del séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, cualquier cosa que se lleve del mundo almacén sigue bajo custodia del Arbites... Por el Trono, ¿es que quieren que les eche encima a Glaito?».

languages.text: “严格地说，只要我依然是行商浪人的随行人员，那{mf|他|她}取走的一切资源，都仍然可以算作由帝国法务部保管……黄金王座在上，不然你希望我怎么办？让格雷托把你们所有人都咬一顿吗？”
languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

traits.locale_text: “严格地说，只要我依然是行商浪人的随行人员，那{mf|他|她}取走的一切资源，都仍然可以算作由帝国法务部保管……黄金王座在上，不然你希望我怎么办？让格雷托把你们所有人都咬一顿吗？”

languages.text: "İşin aslına bakarsak ben Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde olduğum sürece kendisinin depo dünyadan alacağı her şey, hâlen Arbites'in himayesinde sayılır. Taht aşkına, ne yapayım istiyorsun? Glaito'yu üzerinize mi salayım?"
languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

traits.locale_text: "İşin aslına bakarsak, ben Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde olduğum sürece kendisinin depo dünyadan alacağı her şey hâlen Arbites'in himayesinde sayılır. Taht aşkına, ne yapayım istiyorsun? Glaito'yu üzerinize mi salayım?"

languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you?"

languages.text: « Techniquement parlant, tant que je fais partie de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} récupère du monde entrepôt reste sous la garde de l'Arbites... Par le Trône, que voulez-vous que je fasse ? Que je lâche Glaito sur vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Strictly speaking, as long as I remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue, anything {mf|he|she} acquires from the storage world is still in the custody of the Arbites... Throne, what do you want me to do, set Glaito on you all?"

traits.locale_text: « Techniquement parlant, tant que je fais partie de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} récupère du monde entrepôt reste sous la garde de l'Arbites... Par le Trône, que voulez-vous que je fasse ? Que je lâche Glaito sur vous ? »
